Legislative History of Laws

For Law 14-177, see notes following ยง 19-1101.

DC CODE ยง 19-1108

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: A custodial trustee, acting in a fiduciary capacity, has all the rights and powers over custodial trust property which an unmarried adult owner has over individually owned property, but a custodial trustee may exercise those rights and powers in a fiduciary capacity only.
This section does not relieve a custodial trustee from liability for a violation of section 19-1107.
